title: Huge Nintendo Switch and Xbox Software Updates! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.01.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about big new console updates, virtual reality, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:12 - Housekeeping
Today, Galactus comes to Fortnite, and Greg, Barrett, Kevin, and Joey will be taking him on! Come watch the end of season event at 12:45 p.m. PT on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:45 - What is the future of VR?
00:28:41 - We got a couple of big console updates
00:40:20 - Could Travis Scott be making a video game? - Aleia Woods @ XXL
00:44:06 - A fun one: The Xbox Series X Can Run...PS2 Games? - Luke Plunkett @ Kotaku
00:47:39 -  Ad
00:51:40 - Out today
00:56:00 - Squad Up:Ryan Frosty Gillon(PS5) - rygil47
00:: - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Whitta
